info.name: LoanHero Community API - Events, Stories & Resources
info.description:
Complete API collection for the LoanHero Community section.

Base URL: http://localhost:3000

This collection covers:
- üéØ Events (webinars, workshops, Q&A, networking)
- üìñ Success Stories (submissions, featured, filtering)
- üìö Resources (guides, templates, checklists, videos)
- üîß Admin endpoints (create, update, delete)

Setup:
1. Import this collection into Postman
2. Ensure the server is running: `npm run start`
3. Start testing the endpoints!

item.name: üéØ Events
item.description: API endpoints for community events ‚Äî webinars, workshops, Q&A sessions, and networking events.

request.description: Fetch all community events with pagination.

query.description: Filter by type: webinar, qa, networking, workshop

request.description: Fetch events filtered by type. Options: webinar, qa, networking, workshop.
Fetch workshop events.

query.description: Filter by category: loan, visa, scholarship, universities, accommodation

request.description: Fetch events filtered by category.
Fetch only featured events.
Fetch only upcoming events (future dates).
Fetch past events with recordings.
Fetch a single event by its ID. First run 'Get All Events' and copy an event ID.
Register a student for an event. Replace {{eventId}} with a valid event ID.

item.name: üìñ Success Stories
item.description: API endpoints for community success stories from students who secured education loans.

request.description: Fetch all approved success stories with pagination.

query.description: Filter by country: USA, UK, Canada, Australia, Germany, Singapore

request.description: Fetch stories filtered by country.
Fetch success stories from USA.

query.description: Filter by category: MBA, Engineering, Medical, Computer Science, Finance, Public Policy

request.description: Fetch stories filtered by field of study category.
Fetch Engineering success stories.
Fetch only featured/highlighted success stories.
Fetch a single story by ID. First run 'Get All Stories' and copy a story ID.

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Ravi Shankar",
    "email": "ravi.shankar@example.com",
    "university": "ETH Zurich",
    "country": "Switzerland",
    "degree": "MSc Robotics",
    "loanAmount": "‚Çπ25,00,000",
    "bank": "SBI",
    "interestRate": "7.5%",
    "story": "ETH Zurich was my dream university. With SBI's education loan, I was able to pursue my passion for robotics. The process was smooth, and I'm now working at a top robotics company in Zurich!",
    "tips": "Apply early and keep all documents ready. Swiss universities have earlier deadlines than US/UK.",
    "image": "assets/img/avatar_3.png"
}

request.description: Submit a new success story. Stories require admin approval before appearing publicly.

item.name: üìö Resources
item.description: API endpoints for community resources ‚Äî guides, templates, checklists, and video tutorials.

request.description: Fetch all community resources with pagination.

query.description: Filter by type: guide, template, checklist, video

request.description: Fetch resources filtered by type.
Fetch template resources.
Fetch checklist resources.
Fetch video resources.

query.description: Filter by category: Documentation, Application, Loan Types, Repayment, Loan Comparison, Tax & Finance, Travel & Preparation

request.description: Fetch resources by category.
Fetch application-related resources.
Fetch the most downloaded resources.
Fetch a single resource by ID. First run 'Get All Resources' and copy a resource ID.
Increment the download/view count for a resource.
Fetch all active mentors.
Fetch mentors filtered by country.
Fetch mentors filtered by field category.
Fetch top-rated featured mentors.
Get mentor statistics (total mentors, avg rating, etc.).
Fetch a single mentor by ID.

body.raw:
{
    "studentName": "Amit Sharma",
    "studentEmail": "amit.sharma@example.com",
    "studentPhone": "+91-9988776655",
    "preferredDate": "2026-03-01",
    "preferredTime": "6:00 PM IST",
    "message": "I need guidance on applying for an education loan for my MS in Computer Science at Stanford. I have some questions about collateral requirements."
}

request.description: Book a mentorship session with a mentor.

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Pooja Agarwal",
    "email": "pooja.agarwal@example.com",
    "phone": "+91-8877665544",
    "university": "Columbia University",
    "degree": "MS Data Science",
    "country": "USA",
    "loanBank": "HDFC Bank",
    "loanAmount": "‚Çπ55,00,000",
    "bio": "Data Science graduate from Columbia University. Successfully secured an HDFC education loan and completed my degree with distinction. Now working as a Senior Data Scientist at Google NYC. Happy to guide students on loans and study-abroad applications.",
    "expertise": ["Data Science", "USA", "HDFC", "Non-Collateral Loans", "NYC Living Costs"],
    "linkedIn": "https://linkedin.com/in/pooja-agarwal"

request.description: Submit a mentor application. Requires admin approval before the mentor appears publicly.

item.name: üí¨ Forum
item.description: API endpoints for the community forum (discussions).

request.description: Fetch all forum posts with pagination.

query.description: Filter: loan, visa, universities, gre, accommodation

request.description: Fetch forum posts filtered by category.

item.name: üîß Admin - Events
item.description: Admin-only endpoints for managing events. Requires admin JWT token in Authorization header.

body.raw:
{
    "title": "How to Choose Between SBI, HDFC, and ICICI for Education Loans",
    "description": "A comprehensive comparison webinar covering interest rates, processing times, collateral requirements, and hidden charges across India's top 3 education loan providers.",
    "type": "webinar",
    "category": "loan",
    "date": "2026-04-15",
    "time": "7:00 PM - 8:30 PM IST",
    "duration": 90,
    "speaker": "Rajesh Kumar",
    "speakerTitle": "Senior Banking Consultant",
    "maxAttendees": 500,
    "isFree": true,
    "isFeatured": true
}

request.description: Create a new community event. Requires admin authorization.
Update an existing event. Requires admin authorization.
Delete an event. Requires admin authorization.
Get all event registrations. Requires admin authorization.

item.name: üîß Admin - Stories & Resources
item.description: Admin endpoints for managing stories and resources.

request.description: Approve or reject a submitted success story.

body.raw:
{
    "title": "Visa Interview Preparation Flashcards",
    "description": "50 most commonly asked visa interview questions with ideal answers. Printable flashcard format for easy practice.",
    "type": "template",
    "category": "Visa & Travel",
    "fileUrl": "https://resources.loanhero.com/visa-flashcards.pdf",
    "downloadUrl": "https://resources.loanhero.com/download/visa-flashcards.pdf",
    "isFeatured": true
}

request.description: Create a new community resource.
Update an existing resource.
Delete a resource.
Get overall community statistics.
